meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasant or easy to like.
meanings.sent1: Her likability made everyone enjoy her company.
meanings.sent2: The likability of the puppy made it a favorite among the children.
meanings.sent3: His likability was so high that even grumpy people couldn't resist smiling around him.
meanings.sent4: The likability of the new teacher was like a ray of sunshine in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The likability of the character in the movie was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The degree to which someone or something is liked or approved of.
meanings.sent1: The likability of the product determined its success in the market.
meanings.sent2: His likability with the team members helped him become a great leader.
meanings.sent3: The likability of the cake was so high that it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The likability of the singer's voice was like magic to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The likability of the painting captured the hearts of many art enthusiasts.
